pullrequest.title: Play logs as close to real time as possible

content.raw:
Thank you for the PR!

There's been some talk lately that adding protobuf fields would break ABI, but the ABI checker [looks happy](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-abichecker-any_to_any-xenial-amd64/645/). @\_jrivero\_, just wanted to double-check that it's ok to target this at `gazebo7`.
content.html:
Thank you for the PR!

There's been some talk lately that adding protobuf fields would break ABI, but the ABI checker looks happy. @_jrivero_, just wanted to double-check that it's ok to target this at gazebo7.
